pr_title: Session property for setting source tasks count to be used while plan…

timeline.author: sopel39
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -570,6 +571,11 @@ public SystemSessionProperties(
                         REQUIRED_WORKERS_MAX_WAIT_TIME,
                         "Maximum time to wait for minimum number of workers before the query is failed",
                         queryManagerConfig.getRequiredWorkersMaxWait(),
+                        false),
+                integerProperty(
+                        SOURCE_TASK_COUNT_ESTIMATE,
+                        "Set the number of source tasks to be estimated while planning",
+                        null,
                         false));

timeline.bodyText:
It's not only only about source tasks.
I would call it node_count_for_stats_override
timeline.author: sopel39

timeline.bodyText: you should also add corresponding feature config
timeline.author: sopel39

replies.bodyText: I was thinking of skipping feature config to avoid any modifications for all queries implicitly.
replies.author: rohangarg

timeline.message: Session property for setting worker count to be used while planning
